title: How to Empty & Fill the Tank for iRobot Braava jet™ Robot Mop
description:
To empty and fill the tank of your iRobot Braava jet™ Robot Mop, follow this simple instructional video. If using Wet Mopping or Damp Sweeping cleaning pads, Braava jet™ needs to be filled with water. Do not use any other cleaning solution with your robot other than water. Lift the handle to find the tank cap. Lift and swivel the cap to open. Tilt Braava jet™ upward and fill the tank to the top with warm water. Close the cap and lower the handle before starting.

Abt is a proud authorized retailer of iRobot Robotic Vacuums. Shop for the iRobot Braava jet 240 Mopping Robot as well as the full line of iRobot Robotic Vacuums at Abt today!
